tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Hair Removal,Skin Rejuvenation,Double Chin Treatment,Skin Care,Fillers,
review:
I got treated by both Dr. Vritika and Dr. Naveen. They are a young, fun yet professional duo which made me very comfortable with them to begin with. First of all, Thanks to them and NAVA - I never have to go to the parlour again!
They are very patient and answer all my questions. I got laser previously from another clinic but the procedure time was too long so I stopped. But what I loved at NAVA, was that my face, underarms, full arms and legs all got done in a span of 30-45 mins and that was a huge relief ! and the hair growth also had drastically reduced!  
The Q switch treatment I got done helped me get a fresh look on my face! After a lot of contemplation but assurance from Dr. Naveen, I got botox done on my forehead (between eyebrows - frownlines) and it was great - People stopped asking me why I was frowning for no reason - haha ! 
Dr. Vritika gave me a skincare routine that requires very less effort and that for me is perfect with my busy schedule. The soap, Vitamin C serum and sunscreen have been making me give the right kind of love my skin needs ! 

I recommend them 100% for simple, affordable, ********* skin treatments !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Vritika after seeing the reviews in practo and I was satisfied after meeting her. She was very friendly and understood my concerns really well before starting the treatment. My post consultation experience was great where she personally messaged me check on me. I would strongly recommend her!
reply_text: Thank you Varsha for your humble words!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** * *********** ***** ****** my skin recovered very fast by using her prescription. she msg me after a week from my appointment and get to know about my health condition. I was impressed for her follow-up towards patient's health. Thanks Dr. vritika garu.😊
reply_text: Thank you Mr.Naveen for your kind words!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor listened to us carefully to understand the exact problem and asked all required questions to narrow down the root cause.

After she understood the possible causes , she explained us that the allergy could because of few reasons and prescribed medication.

She was patient, polite, confident and knowledgeable.

We’d not yet used the medication completely but we are extremely satisfied with the doctor in this consultation.
reply_text: Hi Mr.Rakesh! Thank you so much :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had a virtual appointment. It happened on time. Doctor is a good listener, empathetic, all my concerns have been clearly addressed. Not just prescribed medication appropriately but also explained its mechanism of action and the latent period I need to wait for it to become affective. I highly recommend this doctor.
reply_text: Thank you so much Mr. Ravi Kiran :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: ********** ** *** ** *** **** ************** I have been visited for facial hair removal treatment. The services provided here are good, quick and effective. The procedure prescribed are explained very well by the doctor. Dr. Vritika is just amazing at what she does. *** ** *** **** ****** **** *** *******,  I suggest to visit the clinic for any cosmetic and hair solutions.

tags: None
review: She is extremely patient, honest and genuine with the right kind of recommendations and treatments. Gives only what is necessary and does consistent follow up checks with her clients to add that extra personal touch to make sure the client has no side effects and is happy with his/her treatment.

tags: None
review: Have visited Nava Clinics for a rash on my cheek. I have not only been treated for it but also was given a good daily routine to follow. I have been using their products and I already see a change in my skin texture. I would recommend you’ll to visit Nava for a smooth, glowing and healthy skin

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******* *** ***** * **** ********* *** *** sudden skin rash occurred on Sunday afternoon. She explained the situation thoroughly and patiently. The medication handled my situation efficiently. Most importantly Dr. Vritika was taking my calls on her personal number as when required and clarified on the issues and provided constant feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Firstly, i would like to thank Dr. Vritika for the treatment and the time she has put in for my problem. The reason i went there is for the treatment of a bleb that kept recurring. It took about six sittings *** * *** ****** *** **** * *** *** **** ******** The treatment here is at an affordable price.All i am saying is that i am so thankful to Dr. Vritika for the treatment.
Thank you so much Doc.

review: *** ******* ** * **** ******* ******* I go to her regularly for skin fillers, scars treatment etc. She does the job really well and the environment in Nava skin clinic is quite friendly as well. I highly recommend Dr. Vritika for any kind of skin treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went for treatment of my acne and scars and I am really happy. Both the Doctors are warm, friendly and while they made me super comfortable they also explained the process to me in detail. I have also done some fillers for my under eye sockets and since then I have been receiving great compliments for my skin and eyes. I am truly happy to have met such doctors and I do recommend them for all treatments. Their technology is also quite advanced.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
context: Photofacial,Cosmetic procedures,Laser Depigmentation,Lactic Peel,Laser Hair Removal,
review:
I had a very pleasant experience everytime I visited Nava. The doctors and the staff are very friendly and make you feel the most comfortable. I got face contouring, depigmentation, and IPL hair removal for my face and arms. I saw a visible reduction and slowest growth of my facial hair in just 2 sittings. 
I underwent 9 sittings of traditional laser treatment few years back elsewhere and sadly couldn't get see much reduction.
The face contouring was also very effective in toning and highlighting my facial features in few sittings. 
So I'll strongly recommend this new IPL technology at NAVA for hair removal and other treatments which is not just effective, time-saving and painless but also costs much less than the traditional laser reduction treatments other clinics offer.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I had a great experience at NAVA! I absolutely love this place! The office is clean with updated and top notch equipment. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for skincare services. Dr. Vritika Gaddam and Dr. Naveen Atluru are very approachable, have a great work ethic and care about their clients. I got my questions answered and was given the right treatment: "Q-switch and facial hair removal" during my short trip to India and the results were seen in 2 days and have received many compliments. Wish I stayed longer to get other treatments as well :) I was also prescribed a good skincare regimen! Will definitely visit them again during my next trip!
